description:
* Based on the murder-mystery style http://anidb.net/t4207 [doujin] visual novel series produced by http://anidb.net/cr1339 [07th Expansion].
Sounds of cicadas can be heard in the late evening, in the village of Hinamizawa — with a population of 2000 souls. And even though the village may seem normal at first glance, the villagers try to hide a horrible secret from newcomers: The curse of Oyashiro-sama. Unusual murders have been occurring ever since the dam construction plan. Is this a coincidence or part of a sinister plan unfolding?
Note: Kai (解) means solution, and the anime will consist of the last two solution arcs "Minagoroshi-hen (Massacre Chapter)" and "Matsuribayashi-hen (Festival Accompanying Chapter)". The Kai series will also consist of an anime exclusive story arc: "Yakusamashi-hen (Another Increase Chapter)".
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
In the year 2007, Mamoru Asakasa returns to a Hinamizawa decimated by the gas leak that killed nearly the entire populace.
Source: HIDIVE

In another iteration of 1983, Keiichi once more learns about Oyashiro’s Curse from Tomitake and Takano, this time also with Irie. Rika worries as the festival approaches.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Awakening Misfortune Chapter Part 1: Playing Tag
厄醒し編 其の壱 鬼ごっこ

REGULAR.description:
Satoko tries to get Rika out of her depression, but her friend won’t admit her fears. That night, Rika argues with a mysterious voice regarding her fate.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 厄醒し編 其の弐 無力

REGULAR.description:
The day of the festival dawns, and Satoko is paranoid that she and Rika are being followed. Is she right?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Awakening Misfortune Chapter Part 3: Pre-established Harmony
Yakusamashi Hen Sono San: Yotei Chouwa
厄醒し編 其の参 予定調和

REGULAR.description:
Satoko flees in terror and has an accident. Injured, she witnesses the Great Hinamizawa Disaster, which sends her into shock.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Awakening Misfortune Chapter Part 4: The Great Hinamizawa Disaster
Erwachendes Unglück Kapitel 4 - Das große Hinamizawa Desaster
Yakusamashi Hen Sono Yon: Hinamizawa Daisaigai
厄醒し編 其の四 雛見沢大災害

REGULAR.description:
A new world comes with the possibility for changing fate. Keiichi may just prove it as he makes a different choice that has multiple effects.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Minagoroshi Hen Sono Ichi: Meiro no Housoku
皆殺し編 其の壱 迷路の法則

REGULAR.description:
With Keiichi’s success, Rika finds that her friends are beginning to avoid making the same mistakes, and she opts to discover a way to fight her own fate.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Massacre Chapter Part 2: The Way to Alter Fate
Massaker Kapitel 2 - Wie man das Schicksal ändert
Minagoroshi Hen Sono Ni: Unmei no Kaekata
皆殺し編 其の弐 運命の変え方

REGULAR.description:
Teppei’s appearance may throw everything into disarray as he begins to abuse Satoko again. The group tries to find a way to help her.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 皆殺し編 其の参 揺らぎ

REGULAR.description:
Despite Satoko’s reluctance to help because of Teppei’s particular blackmail, her friends continue to fight for her freedom.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 皆殺し編 其の四 交渉

REGULAR.description:
Keiichi desperately appeals to the village leaders to aid Satoko, including the head of the Sonozaki family.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 皆殺し編 其の伍 対決

REGULAR.description:
The group finally gets Satoko to reveal her abuse and the police step in. As the festival begins, Rika tries to save Tomitake and Takano, only to discover the true culprit.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Minagoroshi Hen Sono Roku: Tsuyoi Ishi
皆殺し編 其の六 強い意志

REGULAR.description:
Rika explains the Hinamizawa Syndrome and the clinic’s position on the topic. Rika reveals more about the significance of her lineage and why she’s being targeted.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Massacre Chapter Part 7: The Hinamizawa Syndrome
Minagoroshi Hen Sono Nana: Hinamizawa Shoukougun
皆殺し編 其の七 雛見沢症候群

REGULAR.description:
Rika and Hanyuu discuss Rika’s fate, and subsequently the fate of the village, only to conclude that Hanyuu must also desire an end to the cycle.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 皆殺し編 其の八 終末

REGULAR.description:
The spy within the Yamainu is compromised, and the first daring stage of the plan is put into motion.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 祭囃し編 其の壱 三四

REGULAR.description:
The way Takano discovered her grandfather is revealed, alongside her ascension into academic and intellectual circles.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 祭囃し編 其の弐 蠢き

REGULAR.description:
The dam incident is revealed in detail, including the initial confrontation between the Sonozaki and Houjou families.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Fest begleitendes Kapitel 3 - Der Anfang vom Ende
Festival Accompanying Chapter Part 3: The Beginning of the End
Matsuribayashi Hen Sono San: Owari no Hajimari
祭囃し編 其の参 終わりの始まり

REGULAR.description:
With the desire to save Satoko, Rika makes a valiant decision. When Rika’s parents object, Takano utilizes the Oyashiro Curse to her advantage.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 祭囃し編 其の四 謀略

REGULAR.description:
The Maebara family moves in, as does Rena’s. Satoshi disappears, but this time, as Mion’s grandmother discusses burying the hatchet, things seem to be looking up.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Fest begleitendes Kapitel 5 - Das letzte Stück
Festival Accompanying Chapter Part 5: The Last Piece
Matsuribayashi Hen Sono Go: Saigo no Koma
祭囃し編 其の五 最後の駒

REGULAR.description:
Hanyuu transfers into the school and remembers the mastermind behind the eventual demise of Hinamizawa.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 祭囃し編 其の六 幕開け

REGULAR.description:
With the culprit unmasked, the group decides to plan a counter attack, including the faking of Rika’s death.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 祭囃し編 其の七 トラップ

REGULAR.description:
The spy within the Yamainu is compromised, and the first daring stage of the plan is put into motion.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 祭囃し編 其の八 48時間

REGULAR.description:
As Dr. Irie tries to escape his would be captors, he inadvertently may cause the collapse of the plan as a whole.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Fest begleitendes Kapitel 9 - Angriff und Verteidigung
Festival Accompanying Chapter Part 9: Offence and Defence
祭囃し編 其の九 攻防

REGULAR.description:
The Yamainu close in on the Sonozaki estate, and a small group tries to rescue Tomitake with a slim chance of success.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Festival Accompanying Chapter Part 10: Bloody Battle
祭囃し編 其の拾 血戦

REGULAR.description:
Akasaka and Tomitake call on the Benken combat unit to detain Takano and the Yamainu. Unwilling to give in, Takano flees into the mountains, only to meet Rika and her friends.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 祭囃し編 其の拾壱 オシマイ

WIKIPEDIA_JP: ひぐらしのなく頃に解

3834.name: impending death -- TO BE SPLIT AND DELETED

titles.title: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kai
ひぐらしのなく頃に解
В час, коли плачуть цикади: розгадки
